## **Frame Work**

A formal definition a commodity currency remains surprisingly elusive to this day ([A. Jeanneret, V. Sokolovski, 2024](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4564504)). There is a lack of a consistent definition/procedure that can be utilized to draw a conclusion.
